extensionDescription.message: Automatically categorize, summarize, and tag your bookmarks with AI. Provides smart search and Q&A capabilities.

contextMenuTitle.description: The text for the right-click context menu item.

addCurrentPage.description: Button to add the current browser tab as a bookmark.

settings.description: Button to open the main options/management page.

starredBookmarks.description: Tab/label for showing only starred bookmarks.

noBookmarks.description: Message shown when the bookmark list is empty.

operationFailed.description: A generic error message for a failed operation.

taskQueued.message: AI analysis has been added to the queue.
taskQueued.description: Notification that a new bookmark has been queued for AI processing.

pageExists.message: This page is already in your bookmarks.
pageExists.description: Error message when trying to add a duplicate bookmark.

noActiveTab.description: Error when the user tries to bookmark but there is no valid tab.

minutes.description: Suffix for estimated reading time, e.g., '5 min read'.

importBookmarks.description: Button to import existing browser bookmarks.

aiConfig.description: Title for the AI settings section/modal.

qaSystem.description: Button/title for the intelligent Q&A system.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input field.

aiProvider.description: Label for the AI provider selection dropdown.

analysisDepth.description: Label for the AI analysis depth setting.

analysisDepthBasic.description: Option for basic level of AI analysis.

analysisDepthStandard.description: Option for standard level of AI analysis.

analysisDepthDetailed.description: Option for detailed level of AI analysis.

analysisDepthHelp.description: Help text for analysis depth setting.

apiKey.description: Label for the API key input field.

model.description: Label for the AI model selection.

qaQuestionLabel.description: Label for the Q&A question input text area.

questionPlaceholder.message: e.g., recommend some free PDF to PPT tools
questionPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the Q&A question input.

askQuestion.description: Button to submit a question in the Q&A system.

deleteFolder.description: Context menu item to delete a folder.

initializationError.message: Error: Could not load extension settings. Please try reloading the page.
initializationError.description: Error message if the options page fails to initialize.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
confirmDelete.description: Confirmation prompt before deleting a single bookmark.

bookmarkDeleted.description: Toast message confirming a bookmark was deleted.

languageChanged.message: Language changed. The page will now reload.
languageChanged.description: Toast message when the UI language is changed.

configSaved.description: Toast message confirming AI settings were saved.

importFailed.description: Toast message for a failed bookmark import.

importSuccess.description: Toast message for a successful import.

importNoNew.description: Toast message when there are no new bookmarks found during import.

regenerateRequestSent.message: Request to regenerate AI data sent.
regenerateRequestSent.description: Toast message when user requests AI re-analysis.

taskAlreadyQueued.message: This task is already in the queue.
taskAlreadyQueued.description: Toast message when trying to queue an already queued task.

confirmDeleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete the folder '${folderName}' and all of its contents? This cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteFolder.description: Confirmation prompt before deleting a folder and its contents.

folderDeleted.description: Toast confirming a folder was deleted.

rootFolder.description: The name for the root-level folder in the breadcrumb.

searchResults.description: Breadcrumb text when showing search results.

noMatchingBookmarks.description: Message shown when a search yields no results.

folderEmpty.description: Message shown when viewing an empty folder.

tagsMissing.message: AI analysis did not generate tags.
tagsMissing.description: Message shown if AI fails to produce tags.

summaryMissing.message: AI analysis did not generate a summary.
summaryMissing.description: Message shown if AI fails to produce a summary.

keyPoints.description: Label for the key points section.

aiProcessing.description: Status text when AI analysis is in progress.

aiFailed.description: Status text when AI analysis fails.

qaMustEnterQuestion.description: Alert when user clicks 'Ask' with no input.

qaSearchError.message: An error occurred during the search.
qaSearchError.description: Alert for a generic error in the Q&A system.

qaSystemDescription.description: Header for the feature list in the Q&A panel.

qaFeature1.message: Answers questions based on your bookmarks

qaFeature4.message: Helps you rediscover relevant saved content

qaTip.message: Tip: Ask any question, and the AI will provide answers and recommendations based on your collection's profile.
qaTip.description: Help text in the Q&A panel.

qaReasonRelated.message: A relevant site from your collection.
qaReasonRelated.description: AI reason for showing an existing bookmark.

qaJsonParseError.message: The AI response was not in the correct format and could not be parsed.
qaJsonParseError.description: Error when AI response is not valid JSON.

qaTipCheckConfig.message: Check if your AI configuration is correct.

qaAiSearchError.message: Sorry, the AI Q&A feature is temporarily unavailable. Error: ${message}
qaAiSearchError.description: Error message for AI search failure.

qaTruncatedError.message: Sorry, the AI response was incomplete. Please try again.

qaTipRetryComplete.message: Please ask again to get a complete response.

qaNoResults.message: Sorry, no relevant content was found in your bookmarks for: ${question}
qaNoResults.description: Message when Q&A search finds nothing.

qaSuggestion3.message: Wait for AI analysis to complete and try again.

qaResultsFound.message: Found ${count} relevant results in your bookmarks:

aiAnswer.description: Header for the AI's direct answer.

relatedInBookmarks.description: Header for existing bookmarks found by Q&A.

alreadyBookmarked.description: Badge for an item that is already bookmarked.

newRecommendations.description: Header for new sites recommended by AI.

verifying.description: Badge indicating a URL is being verified.

recommendationReason.description: Label for why an item was recommended.

addToBookmarks.description: Button to add a recommended site.

practicalTips.description: Header for a list of tips from the AI.

resetQA.description: Button to reset the Q&A interface.

alreadyExistsToast.message: ⚠️ This site is already in your bookmarks.

errorApiKeyMissing.message: API key is not configured. Please set it in the options.

contentExtractionFailed.message: Could not extract any meaningful content from the page.

errorApiKeyInvalid.message: AI service configuration error. Please check your API key.

errorRateLimit.message: AI service rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

errorTimeout.message: Request to AI service timed out. Please check your network.

errorContentExtractionFailed.message: Failed to extract page content. The site may be protected.

aiSummaryFailedFallback.message: Summary could not be generated. Please try regenerating.

keywordsLabel.description: Label used in meta info extraction.
